oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Little Leaf Baptist Church, circa 1990
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Located in Oliver Springs, Tennessee, Little Leaf Baptist Church was established in 1890 and reorganized in 1910 with Rev. W. J. Peak as its pastor. The church has long served the Oliver Springs community. Adeline Crozier (1861-1926) was one of its founding members, and her descendents, the Crozier family, continue to be involved with the church.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Little Leaf Baptist Church
